data.title: SO GOOD!!!  BBQ at it's finest
data.text: This location (I was told) has been open 2 months, but I went to a more official grand opening, and it was really busy, but so worth the wait.  Chopped Brisket Sandwiches were AMAZING, and we also had brisket smothered baked potatoes which were extremely filling and the portions were very generous.  Looks like it started as a food truck, then moved into a brick building.  Parking lot is a little small, prepare to park on side of road, but they will take care of you.

data.title: Good BBQ and Good People
data.text: I met the owners at the Permian Basin Fair and I am glad I did. I have been looking for some good BBQ since I moved to the area. The owners are very nice and the BBQ is tantalizing...possibly the best in the area. I really like the sausage. The ribs are good and the brisket is tender.
